thread.title: Webb City's Keith surpasses 1,000 points against Lebanon
thread.title_full: Webb City's Keith surpasses 1,000 points against Lebanon

author: Trey Vaughan | tvaughan@joplinglobe.com
title: Webb City's Keith surpasses 1,000 points against Lebanon
text:
Close Webb City’s Holton Keith helps to hold up a sign celebrating his 1,000th career point on Tuesday night after the Cardinals’ 75-47 win over Lebanon inside the Cardinal Dome at Webb City High School. Keith is joined by his dad, Moni, (behind and to the right of Holton), mom, Cathy (far left) and sister, Whitlee, (second from left) and more family.Globe | Chaz Wright
Landon Fletcher (left), Brody Eggleston, Cohen Epler and Landen Piette pose for a photo with Holton Keith (right) after Webb City's win over Lebanon on Tuesday night. Keith surpassed 1,000 career points in the game.
Globe | Chaz Wright
Featured Webb City's Keith surpasses 1,000 points against Lebanon By Trey Vaughan | tvaughan@joplinglobe.com Jan 23, 2025 Jan 23, 2025 3 min to read Webb City’s Holton Keith helps to hold up a sign celebrating his 1,000th career point on Tuesday night after the Cardinals’ 75-47 win over Lebanon inside the Cardinal Dome at Webb City High School. Keith is joined by his dad, Moni, (behind and to the right of Holton), mom, Cathy (far left) and sister, Whitlee, (second from left) and more family.Globe | Chaz Wright
Landon Fletcher (left), Brody Eggleston, Cohen Epler and Landen Piette pose for a photo with Holton Keith (right) after Webb City's win over Lebanon on Tuesday night. Keith surpassed 1,000 career points in the game.
Globe | Chaz Wright
A Webb City steal and fast break opportunity led to Joseph Degraffenreid finding Holton Keith underneath the basket for a layup.
It was one of Keith’s easiest layups of his career. The senior caught the ball flat-footed in front of the block and tossed the ball up for a standing layup with his right hand to put Webb City ahead 37-21 at the 7:15-mark of the third quarter on Tuesday night against Lebanon High School inside the Cardinal Dome at Webb City High School.
